Hellpeon watched Ultimo laughing to himself as the beam ripped 
through his shoulder and as the beam shot at him it was easily dodged 
by flying to the side of it and Ultimo. Fully expecting the fighter 
to dodge an attack in the posistion they are in Hellpeon sped off to 
the other side while he opened fire on him with a large beam of 
Chaochitan energy.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Ultimo tried to dodge to the left but one of hte beams hit his 
> shoulder ripping through it.  His arm hung limp at his side.  "Now 
I 
> am mad", he said as he transformed into his griffon mode.  The 
> giant griffon flew at Hellpeon.  As he opened his mouth, a large 
> blast of plasma flew out heading for Hellpeon.
